title: Pressure for neo-liberalism in Mexico and Nigeria

content.question: The major motivation for neoliberal economic reforms in Mexico and Nigeria has come from which of the following?

choices.label: Political uprising by the urban poor
Debt burdens and pressures from international lenders
The need to expand the economic base for military modernization

content.answer: Debt burdens and pressures from international lenders

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development
